import React from'react';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,LineElement,PointElement,LinearScale,CategoryScale,Tooltip,Legend,Title}from'chart.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(LineElement,PointElement,LinearScale,CategoryScale,Tooltip,Legend,Title);const LineChart=_ref=>{let{data,colors,title}=_ref;const chartData={labels:data.map(item=>item.label),datasets:[{label:title,data:data.map(item=>item.value),borderColor:colors[0],backgroundColor:colors[0]+'33',// Add transparency
tension:0.4,fill:true}]};const options={responsive:true,maintainAspectRatio:false,plugins:{legend:{display:false},title:{display:true,text:title}},scales:{x:{title:{display:true,text:'Categories'}},y:{title:{display:true,text:'Values'},beginAtZero:true}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:'300px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:chartData,options:options})});};export default LineChart;
